title: Broken Window Watch Face
summary: Broken Window Watch Face simulates a broken screen watch.
description: Broken Window Watch Face simulates a broken screen watch.FEATURES:- Classic format- Ambient mode- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches supportINSTRUCTIONS:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose Broken Window Watch Face4. Done!The watch face clock has been tested on round and Squared Watches.
descriptionHTML:
Broken Window Watch Face simulates a broken screen watch.

FEATURES:

- Classic format
- Ambient mode
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches support

INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Broken Window Watch Face
4. Done!

The watch face clock has been tested on round and Squared Watches.
